com.gmail.dengtao.joe.transport
Interface Pushable

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatagramAcceptor, DatagramConnector, DatagramMultiConnector
public interface Pushable

This interface was defined to provide method for DatagramAcceptor, DatagramConnector and DatagramMultiConnector to notify session has data to be sent or not.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
DengTao

Method Summary
 void add(DatagramSession session)
          Notify this session has data to be sent.
 void remove(DatagramSession session)
          Notify this session has no more data to be sent.
